name: Why British Airways Flew to Calgary
description:
British Airways flew between Calgary, Alberta, and London-Heathrow for over a decade, from 2006 to 2019. They had also flown to Calgary back in the 1980s.

In the later years of this most recent route though - even prior to the events of 2020 - BA seemed to be wavering a bit, downgrading it to seasonal at one point before cutting it "permanently" in 2021.

Today, I explore the story of British Airways' YYC-LHR route!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
